column1: Little Goat Diner////Wow. This place has to have the worst service I have ever experience. Â Between waiting 20 minutes to be seated after our reservation time
column2: to then be repeatedly ignored over and over by the entire waitstaff. Unreal. The food is good but waiting 15 minutes to order and 40 to be served is insane. The staff were also rude
column3: and did not inquire as to wether we enjoyed our meal. Awful. Beyond disappointed
